UI Health COVID-19 Team Vaccine Volunteer Inquiry

Are you interested in volunteering to support UI Health's vaccine distribution?

Thank you for your outreach and considering volunteering with UI Health. As vaccine distribution continues to expand in the city, the state and across the country, UI Health continues to ramp up capacity to distribute vaccines for patients and campus community in priority-eligible phases. In particular, we are seeking volunteers with the ability to perform vaccinations. Vaccinator volunteers must be a licensed professional who is eligible to vaccinate (e.g. nurse, pharmacist, dentist, physician). Once you have reviewed the information below please fill out the survey to start the process of becoming a UI Health Team Vaccine Volunteer.

Please note that volunteers may be asked to complete an online application, provide licensing documentation, and complete a background check and medical clearance. Once contacted by Volunteer Services, you will be guided through all necessary requirements and you will receive follow-up instructions as we activate needed volunteers.

Thank you for your support and interest. If you have any questions about volunteering, please contact Kinga Mateja at kmateja@uic.edu.

 

UI Health COVID-19 Team Vaccine Volunteer Inquiry

  • Name: * Required
  • Select the volunteer role that you have interest in volunteering to fill. Please note the associated requirements for each role. * Required
    Vaccinator volunteers must be a licensed professional who is eligible to vaccinate (nurse, pharmacist, dentist, physician).
  • Do you hold an active professional license? * Required
  • UPDATE DAYS?
  • UPDATE TIMES
